entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
